categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kahyin was a male Human who was a major in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire. He was stationed in Kaas City on Dromund Kaas, and frequented the Nexus Room cantina.
Major Kahyin appears as a Social Items Vendor on Dromund Kaas in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released by BioWare in 2011.
